com.petpet.c3po.utils
Class ActionLogHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.petpet.c3po.utils.ActionLogHelper

public class ActionLogHelper
extends Object

A helper class to record and read the last action done over a collection of elements.

Author:
Petar Petrov

Method Detail

recordAction

public void recordAction(ActionLog action)
Records the action. If it is updated, the persistence cache is cleared.

Parameters:
action -

isLastActionUpdated

public boolean isLastActionUpdated(String collection)
Checks if the last action for the given collection was ActionLog.UPDATED_ACTION.

Parameters:
collection - the collection to look for.
Returns:
true if it was updated or null, false otherwise.

getLastAction

public ActionLog getLastAction(String collection)
Obtains the last action for the given collection.

Parameters:
collection - the collection to look for
Returns:
the last action or null if nothing was recorded yet.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if more than one action logs wer found for the given collection.
